snippet: Experts urged caution while using inflatable bouncers after a study found an increase of 111 percent in related injuries between 2008 and 2010 in children younger than 17.
abstract: Experts urged caution while using inflatable bouncers after a study found an increase of 111 percent in related injuries between 2008 and 2010 in children younger than 17.

headline.main: A Rise in Injuries on Inflatable Bouncers
headline.print_headline: Safety: A Rise in Injuries on Inflatable Bouncers
